For the original Toon Disney, see [[Toon Disney|Toon Disney USA]]}} {{Refimprove|date=June 2009}} {{Infobox TV channel | name = Toon Disney Scandinavia | logofile= = [[File:ToonDisneyLogo.gif]] | logosize= = 200px | logo2 = | launch = August 1, 2005 | closed date = September 11, 2009 | picture format = | share = 0.4% | share as of = Sweden 2008 | share source = {{citation|url=http://mms.se/_dokument/rapporter/ar/%C3%85rsrapport%202008.pdf|publisher=MediamÃ¤tning i Skandinavien|title=Ãrsrapport 2008}} | network = | owner = [[The Walt Disney Company]] | slogan = | country = | broadcast area = [[Nordic countries]] and the [[Arab World]] | headquarters = | former names = | replaced by names= [[Disney XD Scandinavia|Disney XD]] | sister names = [[Disney Channel Scandinavia|Disney Channel]]
[[Playhouse Disney Scandinavia|Playhouse Disney]] | timeshift names = | web = }} '''Toon Disney Scandinavia''' was a television channel broadcasting to the Nordic countries owned by [[The Walt Disney Company]]. It was launched on August 1, 2005 on the [[Canal Digital]] and [[Viasat]] satellite platforms, later on expanding into cable systems. Toon Disney Scandinavia broadcasted between 6 am and 10 pm ([[Central European Time|CET]]) [7 am and 11 pm [[Finland]]] and featured audio tracks in [[Swedish language|Swedish]], [[Danish language|Danish]], [[Norwegian language|Norwegian]], [[Finnish language|Finnish]] and [[English language|English]]. It was advertising-free and WAS funded solely by subscriptions The Scandinavian version of Toon Disney, and its sister channel [[Jetix Scandinavia|Jetix]], were available in [[Sweden]], [[Norway]], [[Denmark]], [[Finland]] and the [[Arab World]] and were replaced by [[Disney XD Scandinavia|Disney XD]] on September 11, 2009.
== Shows== Like the other [[Toon Disney]] channels it focused solely on animated content and broadcast series such as: *''[[101 Dalmatians: The Series]]'' *''[[Mickey Mouse Works]]'' *''[[Disney's House of Mouse]]'' *''[[Lloyd in Space]]'' *''[[Buzz Lightyear of Star Command]]'' *''[[Bonkers (TV series)|Bonkers]]'' *''[[TaleSpin]]'' *''[[Mickey's Mouse Tracks]]'' *''[[Donald's Quack Attack]]'' *''[[Quack Pack]]'' *''[[Hercules: The Animated Series|Hercules]]'' *''[[Recess (TV series)|Recess]]'' *''[[The Little Mermaid (TV series)|The Little Mermaid]]'' *''[[Aladdin (TV series)|Aladdin]]'' *''[[Darkwing Duck]]'' *''[[DuckTales]]'' *''[[Goof Troop]]'' *''[[Pepper Ann]]'' *''[[Timon & Pumbaa (TV series)|Timon & Pumbaa]]'' *''[[Disney's Adventures of the Gummi Bears]]'' *''[[Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers]]'' == References == [[Category:Pan-Nordic television channels]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 2005]] [[Category:Television channels and stations disestablished in 2009]] [[Category:Disney Channel]] [[Category:Children's television networks]]
